input.sentences: the principle told the students about a new change in school rules
they seemed very unruly about it
the principle stood strong on the argument
he welcomed to the stage his new assistant
output.sentences: We had an honors assembly today.
We, the students, were not very happy about it.
We were kind of an unruly bunch,.
The principal calmed us with his strict, but cheerful way.
We then went on to the awards.
